Articles.Content:
Hi,

How does one zoom in KSP (I'm particularly interested when inside the VAB) when on PC and not having a number pad?  According to this page Key bindings - Kerbal Space Program Wiki, I should press plus and minus on the number pad to zoom in and out.  I don't have a numpad.  I tried using the plus and minus at the top of my keyboard (while using shift), but that didn't work.

 

Thanks,

Ben

In VAB:

  • Shift + Mouse wheel: camera zoom in/out.
  • Mouse wheel : camera up/down
  • Hold down wheel button for pan

In SPH:

  • Mouse wheel: camera zoom in/out.
  • Shift + Mouse wheel : camera up/down
  • Hold down wheel button for pan

Almost all KSP key bindings can be changed from the settings menu available when you first load the game but before loading a save.
